actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: For the relief of the Wilkinson County School District, in the State of Mississippi.

summary.text: Waives a time limitation for a credit or refund claim under the former provisions of the Internal Revenue Code regarding the windfall profit tax on domestic crude oil paid by a named school district.

titles.title: For the relief of the Wilkinson County School District, in the State of Mississippi.
